Name: Creamsicle
Ingredients: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A creamy orange number that's surprisingly pleasant.
Nutrition: One serving of Creamsicle contains 225 calories
